snippet: DeRIGHT--Robert E.,Jr. Born Wilmington, DE, 1938, died February 2016 from lung failure. Survived by wife Marilyn Goler (brother Ed), son Daniel (Elizabeth) and daughter Kate (Paul; granddaughters Tillie and Greta), sisters Martha DeRight and Mary Lu Geiger (Dale), plus many nephews and nieces. Graduate of Salesianum (Wilm), Reed College, Yale Law School; Army Language Corps (Chinese). Longtime legal malpractice lawyer with Epstein, Becker & Green. World traveler, history reader, bridge player, theater, opera, film and wine lover. Wry, brilliant, loyal, mischievous. Service 1pm, Ballard Funeral Home, White Plains, NY, Saturday, February 20. Tributes to Oxfam America. 1/3
